mapper.select: select r.reservation_date as startDate, r.reservation_id as id, a.name as doctorName, p.name as patientName from reservation r join admin_account a using(admin_id) join patient p using(patient_id) where r.patient_id = #{patient_id} AND r.status != "CANCEL"

select ts.test_name as title, a.name as doctorName, p.name as patientName, r.reservation_id as id, CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(ts.test_date, '%Y-%m-%d'),' ', DATE_FORMAT(CAST(ts.test_time AS TIME), '%H:%i:%s')) AS startDate from test_reservation tr join patient p using(patient_id) join test_schedule ts using(schedule_id) join admin_account a using(admin_id) join reservation r using(reservation_id) where schedule_id = #{schedule_id} AND tr.status != "CANCELED"

select o.operation_name as title, a.name as doctorName, p.name as patientName, o.operation_id as id, CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(o.scheduled_date, '%Y-%m-%d'),' ', DATE_FORMAT(o.scheduled_time, '%H:%i:%s')) AS startDate from operation o join patient p using(patient_id) join admin_account a using(admin_id) where patient_id = #{patient_id} AND o.status != "CANCELED"
mapper.update: update reservation set status = "CANCEL" WHERE reservation_id = #{id} AND DATE(reservation_date) = DATE(#{date})
mapper.select: select r.reservation_date as startDate, r.reservation_id as id, a.name as doctorName, p.name as patientName, p.patient_id as patientId, a.admin_id as adminId from reservation r join admin_account a using(admin_id) join patient p using(patient_id) where r.status != 'CANCEL' AND a.admin_id = #{adminId}

select ts.test_name as title, a.name as doctorName, p.name as patientName, r.reservation_id as id, p.patient_id as patientId, a.admin_id as adminId, tr.schedule_id as scheduleId, CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(ts.test_date, '%Y-%m-%d'),' ', DATE_FORMAT(CAST(ts.test_time AS TIME), '%H:%i:%s')) AS startDate from test_reservation tr join patient p using(patient_id) join test_schedule ts using(schedule_id) join admin_account a using(admin_id) join reservation r using(reservation_id) where tr.status != 'CANCELED' AND a.admin_id = #{adminId}

select o.operation_name as title, a.name as doctorName, p.name as patientName, p.patient_id as patientId, a.admin_id as adminId, o.operation_id as id, CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(o.scheduled_date, '%Y-%m-%d'),' ', DATE_FORMAT(o.scheduled_time, '%H:%i:%s')) AS startDate from operation o join patient p using(patient_id) join admin_account a using(admin_id) where o.status != 'CANCELED' AND a.admin_id = #{adminId}

insert into reservation_cancel(type, patient_id, admin_id, date, reason, reservation_id,schedule_id) value('TEST', #{patientId}, #{adminId}, #{date}, #{reason}, #{reservationId}, #{schedule_id})

mapper.select: select p.email from reservation r join patient p using(patient_id) where r.reservation_id = #{id}
select p.email from test_reservation tr join patient p using(patient_id) where tr.reservation_id = #{id}

mapper.update: update reservation SET status = 'NO_SHOW' WHERE reservation_date <= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 HOUR) AND status = 'WAIT'

update test_reservation tr join test_schedule ts using(schedule_id) SET tr.status = 'NO_SHOW' WHERE TIMESTAMP(ts.test_date, ts.test_time) <= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 HOUR) AND tr.status = 'RESERVED'
update operation SET status = 'NO_SHOW' WHERE TIMESTAMP(scheduled_date, scheduled_time) <= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 HOUR) AND status = 'SCHEDULED'
